file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 31-34-03-04 - CONFIG-1 - OQAR INVERTER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL OQAR INVERTER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH OQAR 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to remove/install the OQAR inverter. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH 31-34-03-000-801-A OQAR INVERTER - REMOVAL OQAR AIRCRAFT WITH 31-34-03-400-801-A OQAR INVERTER - INSTALLATION OQAR EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General CONFIG-1 31-34-03 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 31-34-03-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH OQAR 2. OQAR INVERTER - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to remove the inverter unit. (2) The inverter is installed in the rear electronic compartment. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR Fuselage rear section I - right side C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Rear electronic compartment H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-003-A (1) On the overhead panel, open the QAR circuit breaker. (2) Open door 272DR to get access to the rear electronic compartment. I. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-003-A (1) Disconnect the electrical connector from the inverter. (2) Loosen the screws which attach the inverter to the rack and remove the inverter. (3) Put the protective cover on the electrical connector. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 31-34-03 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH OQAR OQAR Inverter - Removal/Installation Figure 401 DOOR 272DR A B ZONE 272 DET. A DET. B OQAR INVERTER 145AMM310178.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 31-34-03 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 31-34-03-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH OQAR 3. OQAR INVERTER - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the OQAR Inverter. (2) The inverter is installed in the rear electronic compartment. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION TASK 20-40-00-860-801-A - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR Fuselage rear section I - right side D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Rear electronic compartment I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-003-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, make sure that the QAR circuit breaker is open. (2) Put the inverter in its installation position in the rack. (3) Tighten the screws and washers that attach the inverter to the rack. (4) Connect the electrical connector to the inverter. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-003-A (1) Check the inverter output as follows: EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 31-34-03 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (a) On the circuit breaker panel, close the QAR circuit breaker. (b) Make sure the POWER ON indicator on the OQAR is on. (2) Close door 272DR (rear electronic compartment door). (3) Deenergize the aircraft (TASK 20-40-00-860-801-A). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 31-34-03 Page 5 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
